shortdesc.ph: Adaptation of local video quality since the last statistics (based on target frame rate and bitrate).
Adaptation of local video quality since last statistics (based on target frame rate and target bitrate).
Local video quality adaptation since the last statistics (based on target frame rate and target bitrate).
Local video quality adaptation since last statistics (based on target frame rate and bitrate).

plentry.pd: 0: No change in local video quality.
1: Local video quality improves due to increased network bandwidth.
2: Local video quality degrades due to decreased network bandwidth.
